items.title: Get started
items.text: For full documentation visit zensical.org.

items.title: Commands
items.text:
• zensical new - Create a new project
  • zensical serve - Start local web server
  • zensical build - Build your site

items.title: Admonitions
items.text:
Go to documentation

Note

This is a note admonition. Use it to provide helpful information.

Warning

This is a warning admonition. Be careful!

items.title: Details
items.text:
Go to documentation

Click to expand for more info

This content is hidden until you click to expand it. Great for FAQs or long explanations.

items.title: Code Blocks
items.text:
Go to documentation

Code blocks
def greet(name):
    print(f"Hello, {name}!") # (1)!

greet("Python")

  1. Go to documentation

    Code annotations allow to attach notes to lines of code.

Code can also be highlighted inline: print("Hello, Python!").

items.title: Content tabs
items.text:
Go to documentation

PythonRust 
print("Hello from Python!")

println!("Hello from Rust!");

items.title: Diagrams
items.text:
Go to documentation

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

items.title: Footnotes
items.text:
Go to documentation

Here's a sentence with a footnote.1

Hover it, to see a tooltip.

items.title: Formatting
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • This was marked (highlight)
  • This was inserted (underline)
  • This was deleted (strikethrough)
  • H2O
  • ATA
  • Ctrl+Alt+Del

items.title: Icons, Emojis
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • :sparkles:
  • :rocket:
  • :tada:
  • :memo:
  • :eyes:

items.title: Maths
items.text:
Go to documentation

\[ \cos x=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^k}{(2k)!}x^{2k} \]

Needs configuration

Note that MathJax is included via a script tag on this page and is not configured in the generated default configuration to avoid including it in a pages that do not need it. See the documentation for details on how to configure it on all your pages if they are more Maths-heavy than these simple starter pages.

items.title: Headers
items.text:
# H1 Header
## H2 Header
### H3 Header
#### H4 Header
##### H5 Header
###### H6 Header

items.title: Text formatting
items.text:
**bold text**
*italic text*
***bold and italic***
~~strikethrough~~
`inline code`

items.title: Links and images
items.text:
[Link text](https://example.com)
[Link with title](https://example.com "Hover title")
![Alt text](image.jpg)
![Image with title](image.jpg "Image title")

items.title: Lists
items.text:
Unordered:
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Nested item

Ordered:
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item

items.title: Blockquotes
items.text:
> This is a blockquote
> Multiple lines
>> Nested quote

items.title: Code blocks
items.text:
```javascript
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello, world!");
}
```

items.title: Tables
items.text:
| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
|----------|----------|----------|
| Row 1    | Data     | Data     |
| Row 2    | Data     | Data     |

items.title: Horizontal rule
items.text:
---
or
***
or
___

items.title: Task lists
items.text:
- [x] Completed task
- [ ] Incomplete task
- [ ] Another task

items.title: Escaping characters
items.text: Use backslash to escape: \* \_ \# \`

items.title: Line breaks
items.text:
End a line with two spaces  
to create a line break.

Or use a blank line for a new paragraph.
